markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

[See more](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360005003274-GCash-Promos)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Enjoy promos and deals on GCash's products and services! To see the list of current promos, check out the following:

- [Promos page on the GCash website](https://www.beta.gcash.com/promos)
- Social media accounts ( [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/gcashofficial/), [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://twitter.com/gcashofficial), and [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/gcashofficial))
- GCash App

## How to check promos on the GCash app

1\. Log in to your GCash app

2\. Tap **Profile** \> **Promos**

![hello po.jpg](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/42858175634841)

You'll be led to the GCash website that shows all the available promos.

If your voucher isn't working, make sure that it's **not expired**. If the voucher is not expired and still not working, [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=promos__my_voucher_is_not_working.) A customer service representative will contact you within **24 hours**.

If you fulfilled all the requirements of a promo but didn't receive the reward or incentive, [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=promos__i_did_not_receive_my_voucher_/_cashback_/_promo_incentive.) A customer service representative will contact you within **24 hours**.
